maml:description.maml:para: Get a setting from the settings file.
Get a setting from the settings file. The settings file is a JSON file that contains the settings you use in PowerShell scripts.
The name of the setting you want to get.
The section of the setting you want to get.
The default value of the setting you want to get.
The path to the settings file.
If the setting is machine specific. It will look for a value in the configuration using the name prefixed with the machine name.
If the output should be in JSON format. Otherwise it is the object.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}
The name of the setting you want to get.
The section of the setting you want to get.
The default value of the setting you want to get.
The path to the settings file.
If the setting is machine specific. It will look for a value in the configuration using the name prefixed with the machine name.
If the output should be in JSON format. Otherwise it is the object.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will get the setting "MySetting" from the section "MySection" in the settings file "C:\MySettings.json". If the setting is not found it will return "MyDefaultValue".

maml:description.maml:para: Get the configuration file path for SimpleSettings.
Get the configuration file path for SimpleSettings. The configuration file is a JSON file that contains the settings you use in PowerShell scripts.
The path to the settings file.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}
The path to the settings file.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will get the configuration file path for SimpleSettings. If the Path is not provided it will use the default configuration file path.

maml:description.maml:para: Remove a setting from the settings file.
Remove a setting from the settings file. The settings file is a JSON file that contains the settings you use in PowerShell scripts.
The name of the setting you want to remove.
The section of the setting you want to remove.
The path to the settings file.
If the setting is machine specific. It will look for a value in the configuration using the name prefixed with the machine name.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}
The name of the setting you want to remove.
The section of the setting you want to remove.
The path to the settings file.
If the setting is machine specific. It will look for a value in the configuration using the name prefixed with the machine name.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will remove the setting "MySetting" from the section "MySection" in the settings file "C:\MySettings.json".

maml:description.maml:para: Set a setting in the settings file.
Set a setting in the settings file. The settings file is a JSON file that contains the settings you use in PowerShell scripts.
The name of the setting you want to set.
The section of the setting you want to set.
The value of the setting you want to set.
The path to the settings file.
If the configuration backup should be disabled.
If the setting is machine specific. It will save the value in the configuration using the name prefixed with the machine name.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}
The name of the setting you want to set.
The section of the setting you want to set.
The value of the setting you want to set.
The path to the settings file.
If the configuration backup should be disabled.
If the setting is machine specific. It will save the value in the configuration using the name prefixed with the machine name.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will set the setting "MySetting" in the section "MySection" in the settings file "C:\MySettings.json" to "MyValue".

maml:description.maml:para: Set the configuration file path for SimpleSettings.
Set the configuration file path for SimpleSettings. The configuration file is a JSON file that contains the settings you use in PowerShell scripts.
The path to the settings file.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}
The path to the settings file.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will set the configuration file path for SimpleSettings to "C:\MySettings.json".

maml:description.maml:para: Show a setting in the settings file.
Show a setting in the settings file. The settings file is a JSON file that contains the settings you use in PowerShell scripts. The setting will be shown as a JSON object or as a PowerShell object.
The path to the settings file.
If the output should be in JSON format. Otherwise it is the object.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}
If the output should be in JSON format. Otherwise it is the object.
The path to the settings file.
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}
